channel.title: Context Engineering Daily - Prompt Engineering
channel.description: Latest Prompt Engineering news in Context Engineering

item.title: LatentBreak: Jailbreaking Large Language Models through Latent Space Feedback
item.description: arXiv:2510.08604v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Jailbreaks are adversarial attacks designed to bypass the built-in safety mechanisms of large language models. Automated jailbreaks typically optimize an adversarial suffix or adapt long prompt templates by forcing the model to generate the initial pa...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> arxiv, RAG, template, large language model, prompt | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: Inverse-Free Wilson Loops for Transformers: A Practical Diagnostic for Invariance and Order Sensitivity
item.description: arXiv:2510.08648v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large language models can change answers under harmless edits that matter in practice: RAG outputs flip when passages are reordered, fine-tuning erodes invariances learned at pretraining, debate or chain-of-thought prompts take path-dependent routes, ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> fine-tuning, RAG, arxiv, transformer, large language model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: Context-Engineering - "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.
item.description: "Context engineering is the delicate art and science of filling the context window with just the right information for the next step." — Andrej Karpathy. A frontier, first-principles handbook inspired by Karpathy and 3Blue1Brown for moving beyond prompt engineering to the wider discipline of context design, orchestration, and optimization.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> prompt, context, context window, prompt engineering | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
